#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int x[21];
int y[21];

double area_triangle(float x1,float y1,float x2,float y2,float x3,float y3)
{
    double y=((x1*(y2-y3)+x2*(y3-y1)+x3*(y1-y2))/2.0);
    if(y<0) return -1*y;
    else return y;
}
int main()
{
    int t,n,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
           scanf("%d",&x[i]);
        }

        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
           scanf("%d",&y[i]);
        }
          double sum=0;
          int prev=2;
         for(i=3;i<=n;i++)
         {
             sum=sum+area_triangle(x[1],y[1],x[prev],y[prev],x[i],y[i]);
             prev=i;
         }
         printf("%.1lf\n",sum);

    }
    return 0;
}
